participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: Cheerful and adventurous, Emma loves exploring new places and making friends.
participant_1.background: i love to go to disney world every year. mickey mouse is my favorite character. i play with my friends on the playground. i love to sing songs from the movie frozen. i'm in the third grade.

participant_2.name: Gerald
participant_2.personality: Wise and spirited, Gerald enjoys sharing stories from the past and celebrating life.
participant_2.background: i am 100 years old. i love to drink wine and dance in the moonlight. i am very strong for my age. i feel like i might live forever. i remember when nobody had a television.
